snippet: U.S. Army veteran Mario Hernandez, 58, was sworn in as a citizen on Wednesday, decades after he believed he had been naturalized when he enlisted during the Vietnam War era....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Citizenship Given to Cuban-Born Man Who Thought 1975 Army Enlistment Made Him Citizen
headline.main: U.S. Citizenship Given to Cuban-Born Man Who Thought 1975 Army Enlistment Made Him Citizen

lead_paragraph: U.S. Army veteran Mario Hernandez, 58, was sworn in as a citizen on Wednesday, decades after he believed he had been naturalized when he enlisted during the Vietnam War era.
